name: Seven gems
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam 32
Controls:
Move  - arrow keys
Jump - space
Attack - Q
Move boulder - W
Smash boulder - E (gloves needed)
If the cave entrance/exit doesnt work, jump into it!
Unfortunately due to lack of time (as always) there are some bugs, the levels were rushed, I had to scrap the whole narrative thing and no sound :(
Either way hope you like it :)

Tools used:
Godot 3.2.3
PIxelorama
Krita
font : https://saint11.org/blog/fonts/
